title: Champion Shards
body: Why are the champion shards not in the shop?  I don't understand why Riot had to take them down during Snowdown. -_-  Does anybody know another way to find champion shards except from the Featured section in the shop?  Thank you.

replies.body: I haven't heard anything about champion shards being disabled in the store.  I just checked the store and was able to see it without issue.  You'll find it under Accessories then Hextech Crafting.  I hope that helps!
